entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 13. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries late this morning and this afternoon. Wind becoming east 20 km/h this afternoon. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 30 this morning and minus 20 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Tuesday 10 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 17. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Periods of snow beginning after midnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind southeast 30 km/h. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 22 this evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Tuesday 10 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of snow. High minus 10.
